short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to help users evaluate the sustainability of their purchases and get tips on how to reduce their carbon footprint

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SustainaBrowse is a Chrome extension to help users evaluate the sustainability of their purchases and get tips on how to reduce their carbon footprint.
